content.question: Which of the following is a feature of Maya Linâ€™s Vietnam Veterans Memorial that constitutes its primary departure from traditional war memorials?

choices.label: The use of black granite rather than the more common polished bronze
The link to environmentalism implied by its designation as an earthwork
The omission of introductory texts and dates related to the war
The nonfigurative composition made up of engraved names

content.answer: The nonfigurative composition made up of engraved names

topic.text: 10.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
